recipe_name: Green beans with garlic and almonds
author: Jane Sen
method: Drop the beans into boiling water and boil for 10 minutes. Drain and pile into a warm serving dish. Gently heat the oil with the garlic until it is just turning golden, quickly toss in the almonds and the tamari, stir and brown a few minutes longer. Tip over the green beans. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 450g/1lb French green or bobby beans,  3 tbsp olive oil,  2 cloves garlic, sliced thinly,  100g/4oz slivered or whole almonds,  2 tbsp tamari soy sauce
